Class.ClassComment: DiffColumn /** * A column than can perform diff with another column. E.g.: Useful when querying the differences in a user edited column for update column event. BZ-996944: The idea is to show the changed fields and its values in audit log events. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Analyze differences between two columns of same type. * @param otherColumn The column to compare with this one. * @return A list of fields and its values that have changed. */
